title: Pixel 3 xl battery discharging quickly after the update
content:
Battery life on Android 10 is terrible but I have noticed that it's getting worse since the last big update.
Full charge now lasts less than 12 hours and the battery use app doesn't seem to work.
When battery reached 27%, usage of all apps only added up to 36%, which doesn't make sense, or is suggesting that system is eating battery.

I had several issues recently with the system so the system is already restarted, hence I don't want to be doing this again "just in case".
The "try in safe mode" silver bullet is not something I want to try as it will not show what is draining the system.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
